info.title: SuperOffice Agent API v1
info.termsOfService: You must be an authorized user to access this API.

post.summary: Gets a Contact object.

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Contact object

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Returns the contacts where there has been activity since activityStartTime.
post.description:
If activityStartTime is larger than the current date, all contacts with activity since last log-out are returned. The result set can be filtered by category and action type.
NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: ActivityStartTime, ContactCategories, ActionType

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Deletes the ContactEntity.
post.description:
This table supports Soft Delete; records will be marked as deleted and disappear from the GUI and API results, but will not be physically deleted by this (and any other) method.
NsApiSlow threshold: 2000 ms.

parameters.name: contactEntityId
parameters.description: The identity of the ContactEntity

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Method that returns a set of initial contacts.
post.description:
This could be the contacts in a favorites selection, the history list, the diary, or from all sources. If retrieved from the diary it will get appointments for the current and the next day.
NsApiSlow threshold: 2000 ms.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: SourceType

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Contact.description:
Carrier object for Contact.
Services for the Contact Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IContactAgent">Contact Agent</see>.

URL.description: The internet address to this contact

Kananame.description: Contact kana name, used in Japanese versions only

AssociateFullName.description: The associate's culture formatted fullname (firstname, middleName and lastname)

CountryName.description: Name of country in installed language

Address.description: Contact address as  a list of LocalizedFieldList objects. Used to store localized information such as formatted address data. Suitable for passing to an address control for display.

FormattedAddress.description: The contact's address, formatted with linebreaks and spaces into a single string.

IsOwnerContact.description: Is the contact an owner contact.  This means that all persons on this contact can on only be internal users and not external users.

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Address.description:
Street and/or Postal address, in both formatted and structured forms. You only need to modify one of the two for the change to be registered.
<para />
Carrier object for Address.

Wgs84Latitude.description: Latitude (that's north/south), decimal degrees, relative to WGS 84 ellipsoid. SuperOffice ASA is at 59.91892. This value needs no further grid reference or other qualifying information.

Wgs84Longitude.description: Longitude (that's East/west), decimal degrees, relative to WGS 84 ellipsoid. SuperOffice ASA is at 10.73159. This value needs no further grid reference or other qualifying information.

LocalizedAddress.description: LocalizedFieldArray is a list of LocalizedFieldList objects. Used to store localized information such as formatted address data.

Street.description: Street address (company street, person address, delivery address). LocalizedAddress changes override this property, so you do not have to change both Localized and this.

Postal.description: Postal address (company postal, billing address). LocalizedAddress changes override this property, so you do not have to change both Localized and this.

Formatted.description:
Read-only formatted address multi-line string. Combines street and postal into one string. e.g.: <c>"Postboks 123,
Brugata 123,
1234 OSLO
"</c> or <c>"Postbox 123,
Bridgelane 123,
West Tooting,
East Shire ES2 W31
"</c>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.LocalizedField.description:
LocalizedField is used to store localized information such as formatted address data, a formatted phone number, etc.
<para />
Carrier object for LocalizedField.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.TableRight.description:
Wraps a table right together with an explanatory reason.
Code can indicate why access is restricted.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldProperty.description: Class holding properties like field length, field type about a field in the carrier.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldRight.description:
Wraps the field right together with an explanatory reason.
Also adds logical operators to the field rights so that they can be easily combined.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.StructuredAddre.description:
Address with structured fields (Address1, City, Zip) - does not vary its layout by country, unliked the formatted address.
<para />
Carrier object for StructuredAddress.

AtypeIdx.description: Bit mask, combines address type (EAddressType) and owner type (EOwnerType)

Formatted.description:
Read-only formatted address multi-line string. e.g.: <c>"Brugata 123,
1234 OSLO
"</c> or <c>"Bridgelane 123,
West Tooting,
The Shire ES2 W31
"</c>.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ContactCa.description: GetMyActiveContacts: Returns the contacts where there has been activity since activityStartTime. If activityStartTime is larger than the current date, all contacts with activity since last log-out are returned. The result set can be filtered by category and action type.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactActivity.description:
Carrier object for ContactActivity.
Services for the ContactActivity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IContactAgent">Contact Agent</see>.

Action.description: The activity that has occured on this contact.

ActionTime.description: The time of the activity. If more than one activity has occured on the contact, the last activity time is shown.

ActivityPersonName.description: The person that carried out the activity on the contact.

ActionId.description: Id of the last element an activity was found on. I.e. AppointmentId, ContactId, or PersonId

ActivityPersonId.description: Id of the person causing the activity.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.description:
The Contact Service. The service implements all services working with the Contact object
<para />
Carrier object for ContactEntity.
Services for the ContactEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IContactAgent">Contact Agent</see>.

Interests.description:
The contact's available and selected interests. 
<para>Use MDO List name "contint" to get list items.</para>

Description.description: Description of the contact. Usually shown as a postit note.

UpdatedBy.description: The user that last updated the contact

CreatedBy.description: The user that created the contact

Associate.description:
The user that owns this contact. 
<para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

Business.description:
The business that the contact is associated with. The GUI forces the user to enter a business type. 
<para>Use MDO List name "business" to get list items.</para>

Category.description:
The category that is set on the company. The GUI forces the user to enter a category type 
<para>Use MDO List name "category" to get list items.</para>

Country.description:
The country this contact is located in. The country a contact is saved with, affects the phone number format, and the address layout. 
<para>Use MDO List name "country" to get list items.</para>

Persons.description: The persons belonging to the contact.

NoMailing.description: Spam filter. Indicates if this contact should retrieve advertising.

Kananame.description: Contact kana name, used in Japanese versions only

GroupId.description: Group id of original owning associate, semantics like appnt.grp_id

ActiveStatusMonitorId.description: Active status monitor identity with the lowest rank for contact

SupportAssociate.description: <para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

TicketPriority.description: <para>Use MDO List name "ticketpriority" to get list items.</para>

Deleted.description: If nonzero, then this contact is 'deleted' and should generally not be shown

DbiKey.description: The primary key for the integrated entry in the external datasource.

DbiLastModified.description: When the entry was last modified.

Source.description: How did we get this contact? For future integration needs

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

BounceEmails.description: Email addresses with a positive bounce counter.

Domains.description: Web domains for this contact, ordered in array by rank

UtmParameters.description: Utm parameters when creating first person and contact, readonly field

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Dictionary of user defined field data.
The key string is the ProgId of the UdefField, or if the ProgId is empty it is a string of the format "SuperOffice:[UdefFieldIdentity]", e.g. "SuperOffice:1234"

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="P:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactEntity.UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.EntityElement.description:
Generic carrier object for entity elements such as Phone, EntityElement, Url. These elements do not have id and rank. These values are changed on each save, and should not be depended on. When used in a list or array the rank is the ascending list order.
<para />
Carrier object for EntityElement.

Value.description: The Element FullName.  This is a value that is intended to be shown to the user.

StrippedValue.description: The Element FullName.  This is a value that can be parsed and used by systems.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SelectableMDOLi.description:
Carrier object for SelectableMDOListItem.
Services for the SelectableMDOListItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMDOAgent">MDO Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: The deleted status of the ListItem

Type.description: The type of the ListItem. Custom field.

ColorBlock.description: The color indicator of the ListItem color block

IconHint.description: The Icon hint of the ListItem. Custom field.

Selected.description: True if the ListItem is selected

ChildItems.description: The child items of the SelectableMDOListItem

ExtraInfo.description: Extra information added to the ListItem. Could be information such as sort order etc or other meta data. Custom field.

StyleHint.description: Style hint indicating, information such as background color etc. Custom field.

Hidden.description: True if the ListItem is hidden

FullName.description: The name of the ListItem in its context

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.description:
Carrier object for Associate.
Services for the Associate Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IAssociateAgent">Associate Agent</see>.

Name.description: Initials, also login name, possibly database user name

PersonId.description:
Owning person record 
<para>Use MDO List name "person" to get list items.</para>

Type.description: User type - 1 = internal user, 2 = resource, 3 = external user, 4 = anonymous, 5 = system

GroupIdx.description: Primary group membership, see UserGroupLink for secondary memberships

FullName.description: The associate's culture formatted fullname (firstname, middleName and lastname)

FormalName.description: The associate's culture formatted formalname (firstname, middleName and lastname, title, mrmrs)

Deleted.description: If true, the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

EjUserId.description: ID of the ej user record corresponding to this associate; 0 for associates that are not ej users

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.ExtraFields} and <see cref="!:UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Business.description:
Carrier object for Business.
Services for the Business Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Category.description:
Carrier object for Category.
Services for the Category Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Country.description:
Carrier object for Country.
Services for the Country Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

Name.description: Name of country in installed language

ImageDescription.description: Description of the country's flag image. (This is the country flag that is displayed in the CRM client)

DomesticAddressLayoutId.description: Domestic address layout of the country

ForeignAddressLayoutId.description: Foreign address layout of the country

Deleted.description: true if the country is deleted

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Person.description:
Carrier object for Person.
Services for the Person Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPersonAgent">Person Agent</see>.

Position.description: The position. This is a predefined SuperOffice value, different from Title

FullName.description: Get the persons full name (internal name used in clients for employees).

DirectPhone.description: Returns the direct phone that belong to the contact person.

FormalName.description: Get formal name for a person, as used in labels. (Full name + person title + academic title)

Retired.description: 1 = the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

Rank.description: Display sort sequence for default sort order

ActiveInterests.description: Number of records in pintr table; select count(*) from pintr pi where pi.person_id = this.person_id == activeInterests is always true

FaxPhone.description: Returns the fax phone that belong to the contact person.

MobilePhone.description: Returns the mobile phone that belong to the contact person.

ContactPhone.description: Returns the direct phone that belong to the persons contact.

AssociateId.description: Id of the item's owner (Associate id)

UsePersonAddress.description: If 1, use person's address for mailing instead of company address

ContactFax.description: Actual phone number as eneterd by the user

Kanafname.description: Kana first name, used in Japanese versions only

Kanalname.description: Kana last name, used in Japanese versions only

Post1.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post2.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post3.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

ActiveErpLinks.description: How many active ERP links are there for this person?

SupportAssociateId.description: Our support contact for this person

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketPriority.description:
Carrier object for TicketPriority.
Services for the TicketPriority Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CustomerLanguag.description:
Customer languages that customer center supports.
<para />
Carrier object for CustomerLanguage.
Services for the CustomerLanguage Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SavedUtmParamet.description:
Inital Utm parameters for a given person or contact.
<para />
Carrier object for SavedUtmParameters.
Services for the SavedUtmParameters Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPersonAgent">Person Agent</see>.

FormName.description: The name of form for the first submission

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ContactCa.description: Undelete: This entity supports Soft Delete. Call this method to Undelete a previously soft-deleted record
GetPersons: Returns an array of all the contact persons for the company card.
GetContactWithPersons: Returns the contact with all the contact persons belonging to the contact
ChangeCountry: Change country regenerates the default values and localized information such as phone number and address format
GetAddress: Gets the contact's localized address.
GetAddressByCountry: Gets the contact's localized address.
AddPerson: Add a person to the given contact

Mrmrs.description:
e.g. Mrs   sex_title 
<para>Use MDO List name "mrmrs" to get list items.</para>

BirthDate.description: The Person birth date as UTC Date. Year 1 = Null. Year 2 = unknown year.

CreatedBy.description: The user that created the person object

Emails.description: A collection of the person's emails

Description.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

IsAssociate.description: Checks if the person object is an associate. The property is read-only.

PrivatePhones.description: Returns a collection of phone numbers that belong to the contact person.

Faxes.description: Returns a collection of fax numbers that belong to the contact person.

MobilePhones.description: Returns a collection of mobile phone numbers that belong to the contact person.

OfficePhones.description: Returns a collection of office phone numbers that belong to the contact person.

OtherPhones.description: Returns a collection of pagers that belong to the contact person.

Position.description:
The position. This is a predefined SuperOffice value, different from Title 
<para>Use MDO List name "perspos" to get list items.</para>

UpdatedBy.description: The person that last updated the person object

Contact.description:
The contact the contact person is registered on. This is required unless the 'MandatoryContactOnPerson' preference is set. 
<para>Use MDO List name "contact_new" to get list items.</para>

Country.description:
The country this contact person is located in. 
<para>Use MDO List name "country" to get list items.</para>

Interests.description:
The person's available and selected interests. 
<para>Use MDO List name "persint" to get list items.</para>

FullName.description: The person's full name localized to the current culture/country.  (internal name used in clients for employees)

NoMailing.description: Spam filter. Indicates if this person should retrieve advertising.

UsePersonAddress.description: True if the person's address should be used as mailing address, instead of the contact's address.

Retired.description: True if the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

Urls.description: The urls related to this person.

FormalName.description: Get formal name for a person, as used in labels. (Full name + person title + academic title)

Address.description: Structure holding formatted address data. The layout of the array structure indicates the layout of the localized address.

Post3.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post2.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post1.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Kanalname.description: Kana last name, used in Japanese versions only

Kanafname.description: Kana first name, used in Japanese versions only

CorrespondingAssociate.description: The associate corresponding to this person. Will be empty if the person is not a user (internal associate user, external user).

Category.description:
Person's category. Usually null. Refer to the Contact.Category instead.  Intended for use when individual persons are created. (i.e. when Person.Contact is blank) 
<para>Use MDO List name "category" to get list items.</para>

Business.description:
Person's business - usually blank. Use Contact.Business instead. Intended for use when individual persons are created. (i.e. when Person.Contact is blank) 
<para>Use MDO List name "business" to get list items.</para>

Associate.description:
The associate owning this person (similar to contact.Associate) - usually blank. Use the Person.Contact.Associate instead.  Intended for use when individual persons are created (i.e. when Person.Contact is blank) 
<para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

Salutation.description:
Academic title, populated from Salutation list but can be overwritten with anything at all 
<para>Use MDO List name "salutation" to get list items.</para>

SupportAssociate.description: <para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

TicketPriority.description: <para>Use MDO List name "ticketpriority" to get list items.</para>

CustomerLanguage.description: <para>Use MDO List name "customerlanguage" to get list items.</para>

DbiKey.description: The primary key for the integrated entry in the external datasource.

DbiLastModified.description: When the entry was last modified.

SentInfo.description: Has information on username/password been sent (ejournal)

ShowContactTickets.description: Should tickets related to the company be shown to this person

UserInfo.description: Information about the user if this person is a user.  If IsAssociate (e.g. is user is true) the UserInfo will be provided.

Source.description: How did we get this person? For future integration needs

ActiveErpLinks.description: How many active ERP links are there for this person?

ShipmentTypes.description: The person's available and selected shipment types.

Consents.description: The person's available consent information. Missing consents are not deleted. To remove a consent, mark its legalbase as 'WITHDRAWN'

BounceEmails.description: Email addresses with a positive bounce counter.

ActiveStatusMonitorId.description: Active status monitor identity with the lowest rank for person

CreatedByFormId.description: The form id of the form that created the person

UtmParameters.description: Utm parameters when creating this person, readonly fields

LeadstatusId.description: Refinement of categories of lead type. Empty if the category is not a lead type.

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Dictionary of user defined field data.
The key string is the ProgId of the UdefField, or if the ProgId is empty it is a string of the format "SuperOffice:[UdefFieldIdentity]", e.g. "SuperOffice:1234"

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="P:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PersonEntity.UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Position.description:
Carrier object for Position.
Services for the Position Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.UserInfo.description:
Carrier object for UserInfo.
Services for the UserInfo Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: If true, the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

UserName.description: Initials, also login name, possibly database user name

UserGroupId.description: Primary group membership, see UserGroupLink for secondary memberships

EjUserId.description: ID of the ej user record corresponding to this associate; 0 for associates that are not ej users

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ConsentInfo.description:
Consent information for a give person. Consents are for a particular Purpose, and may be withdrawn (see LegalBase).
<para />
Carrier object for ConsentInfo.
Services for the ConsentInfo Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPersonAgent">Person Agent</see>.

Registered.description: When this consent record was created  in UTC.

RegisteredAssociateId.description: The ID of the associate who created this record

Updated.description: When this consent record was last updated  in UTC.

UpdatedAssociateId.description: The ID of the associate who last updated this record

LegalBaseId.description: Primary key for the LegalBase associated with this consent

LegalBaseKey.description: Key for the LegalBase associated with this consent

LegalBaseName.description: Name of the LegalBase associated with this consent

ConsentPurposeId.description: Primary key for the ConsentPurpose associated with this consent

ConsentPurposeKey.description: Key of the ConsentPurpose associated with this consent

ConsentPurposeName.description: Name of the ConsentPurpose associated with this consent

ConsentSourceId.description: Primary key for the ConsentSource associated with this consent

ConsentSourceKey.description: Key of the ConsentSource associated with this consent

ConsentSourceName.description: Name of the ConsentSource associated with this consent

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ContactCa.description: GetDuplicates: Get duplicates (exact or similar in the database) based on the name

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DuplicateEntry.description:
A duplicate entry
<para />
Carrier object for DuplicateEntry.

SoPrimaryKey.description: Identity of an entry in the SuperOffice database. Should be 0 for matches from external systems.

EntryIdentifier.description: String identifier for entry. Typically used to identify an entry in an external system.

RuleDisplayName.description: Short name of rule to display to user

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ContactCa.description: CreateNewEntry: Creates a new contact based on external duplicate

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DuplicateRule.description:
Describes one duplicate rule to be used to find similar entries
<para />
Carrier object for DuplicateRule.

DisplayName.description: Short name of rule to display to user

IsActive.description: Indicating if a rule is current active, and should included in the duplicate detection

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ContactCa.description: SetDuplicateRulesStatus: Set which duplicate rules should be active or not
Merge: Merge two contacts. The destination contact will remain.
Copy: Copy a contact. Activities and related data will be ignored
GetNameDepartmentDuplicates: Get duplicates based on the contact name and department
GetDomainDuplicates: Get duplicates based on the domain
IsNumberValid: Checks if the number is unique or required.  The setting is configured from admin under system options.
GetQuoteVersionAddresses: Get the associated billing and invoice quote version addresses. These addresses might be address on the contact, or a custom address.
SaveQuoteVersionAddress: Save a custom quote version address.
GetContactSummary: Get summary of contact and its recent activity.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactSummary.description:
Summary of contact with recent activities, chats, and requests included.
<para />
Carrier object for ContactSummary.
Services for the ContactSummary Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IContactAgent">Contact Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketSummaryIt.description:
The ticket summary with heading, created date.
<para />
Carrier object for TicketSummaryItem.
Services for the TicketSummaryItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ITicketAgent">Ticket Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ActivitySummary.description:
Summary details about appointments and documents.
<para />
Carrier object for ActivitySummaryItem.
Services for the ActivitySummaryItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IAppointmentAgent">Appointment Agent</see>.

DocumentId.description: Document id - 0 if not a document

Completed.description: The Completed state. NotStarted(1) or Completed(3)

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleSummaryItem.description:
Sale Summary item 
<para />
Carrier object for SaleSummaryItem.
Services for the SaleSummaryItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ISaleAgent">Sale Agent</see>.

Probability.description: Probability of sale succeess in percent (0-100)

Currency.description: Currency the sale amount is in.

AmountInBaseCurrency.description: Sale amount converted to the base currency.

Status.description: The sale's status, indicating whether the sale is open(1), sold(2) or lost(3).

Completed.description: The Completed state. NotStarted(1) or Completed(3)

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatSummaryItem.description:
Chat session summary: id, title, created date
<para />
Carrier object for ChatSummaryItem.
Services for the ChatSummaryItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

Name.description: The name of customer, if provided

CompanyName.description: The name of the customers company, if provided

FirstMessage.description: A copy of the first message in the chat session

LastMessage.description: A copy of the last message in the chat session

WhenRequested.description: When the session was requested by the customer.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ContactCa.description: ValidateContactEntity: Check that entity is ready for saving, return error messages by field.
EnrichContactEntity: Enrich a contact with data from the AI Enrichment service. This will update the contact with address, phone number, and email.

GetMyRecentContacts: Method that returns a set of initial contacts. This could be the contacts in a favorites selection, the history list, the diary, or from all sources. If retrieved from the diary it will get appointments for the current and the next day.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PreviewContact.description:
Contact preview
<para />
Carrier object for PreviewContact.
Services for the PreviewContact Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IContactAgent">Contact Agent</see>.

URL.description: The internet address to this contact

AssociateFullName.description: The associate's culture formatted fullname (firstname, middleName and lastname)

Address.description: Contact address as a list of LocalizedFieldList objects. Used to store localized information such as formatted address data. Suitable for passing to an address control for display.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ContactCa.description: GetPreviewContact: Get a contact from its ID
GetPreviewEnrichContact: Get a contact from its ID

SuperOffice Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.

externalDocs.description: The SuperOffice DevNet Community has more documentation, examples, and discussion forums.
